question: {n} saw a {x}-foot {big_fish} with {k} remoras, each {y} inches long attached to it. Then, a fraction of {frac} of the remoras swam away. Later, {n} saw another {x2}-foot {big_fish} with {k2} remoras, each {y2} inches long, attached to it. On average, what percentage of each {big_fish}'s body length is covered by the remoras?
